original_title: Victim charged in Cincinnati downtown brawl that injured several | Fox News
article_summary: Police body camera footage shows officers responding to a lone 911 call reporting a brutal attack in downtown Cincinnati, where a man identified as a victim has been charged with disorderly conduct. Another suspect, Gregory Wright, has been arrested for allegedly snatching a victim's chain during the viral brawl, and seven suspects in total have been charged with various crimes related to the attack.</s>
